	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Dracon walks over to a compartment in the designated corner.  It seemed tha=
t all  the essentials were here.  First he isolated the equipment from the =
two bombs and then began to bring it out.  He picks up about half of it in =
his arms and then lugs it over, bringing the rest next.
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, J=
une 19, 2003 9:31 PM
  Subject: Re: StarDrill Inc.


  Krhinos: Alright, Ru=
kus. The warp won't be long, so keep an eye out on
  the other side. I want=
 to be warned of anything unusual.

  He took hold of a metal crate twice h=
is size and moved it in the cargo
  hold of the large transport shuttle. Th=
e crate contained nothing else
  than much of the necessary item to establi=
sh a base camp onplanet.

  Krhinos: Dracon, get the mining equipment from =
that corner inside, but
  leave the two bombs here.

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
  > --Rukus--
  > 
  > "Alright Kr=
hinos." He replies, then checks the safe distance from 
  > the station, an=
d then turn on his comm again, "Prep for launch. 
  > Engines firing..." Th=
e engines charged up and being propulsing the 
  > ship.
  > 
  > 
  > --- =
In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
  > > Krhinos:=
 Please, no countdown. Just engage the drives when we're in
  > > range so =
we can get there and establish a camp as soon as possible.
  > > Dracon, me=
et me in the cargo bay. We'll load a shuttle that we'll 
  > send
  > > dow=
n.
